tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNS arms) (CC and) (NNS legs)) (VP (VBP are) (ADVP (RB so)) (NP (NP (JJ sore) (NN :-LRB-)) (CC and) (NP (NP (NN tomorrow) (POS 's)) (NN truck) (NN day)))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [:-LRB-/NN nsubj>[arms/NNS cc>and/CC conj:and>legs/NNS] nsubj>legs/NNS cop>are/VBP advmod>so/RB amod>sore/JJ cc>and/CC conj:and>[day/NN nmod:poss>[tomorrow/NN case>'s/POS] compound>truck/NN] punct>!/.]
